name: NodeJS-TS-Package-Code-Template
description: AZMMine's template for a Typescript NodeJS package
author: AZMCode <15837568+AZMCode@users.noreply.github.com>

scripts.clean:all: yarn run clean:docs-MD && yarn run clean:docs-HTML && yarn run clean:dist
scripts.build:docs-all: yarn run build:docs-html && yarn run build:docs-md
scripts.build:all: yarn run lint && yarn run build:ts && yarn run test && yarn run build:docs
scripts.build:all-rel: yarn run clean && yarn run lint && yarn run build:ts-rel && yarn run test && yarn run build:docs
scripts.bStart: yarn run build-all && yarn run start
